entities.name: gringotts
entities.description: Gringotts is described as a place of wonder and an enchanted repository of gold. It is also referred to as the bank.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is introduced as one of the characters who is visiting Gringotts, and she steps forward after Travers.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as being with Hermione and Travers at Gringotts, and Hermione explains features of the hall to him.

entities.name: travers
entities.description: Travers is introduced as a character who is visiting Gringotts, and he passes over a tiny golden key to the goblin.

entities.name: madam lestrange
entities.description: Madam Lestrange is mentioned by the goblin as being present at Gringotts, and she steps forward after Travers.

relationships.description: Hermione visits Gringotts along with Ron and Travers.
Travers interacts with the goblin at Gringotts, passing over a tiny golden key to him.
Hermione meets Madam Lestrange at Gringotts, as introduced by the goblin.
